original_text: Then Korah assembled all the congregation against them at the entrance of the tent of meeting. And the glory of the Lord appeared to all the congregation.
korean_text: 고라가 온 회중을 회막 문에 모아 놓고 그 두 사람을 대적하려 하매 여호와의 영광이 온 회중에게 나타나시니라

sentences.original_text: Then Korah assembled all the congregation
against them at the entrance of the tent of meeting
And the glory of the Lord appeared
